content: व्यूढ {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Expanded, developed, broad, wide; व्यूढोरस्को वृषस्कंधः <ls>R. 1. 13.</ls> {@--2@} Firm, compact. {@--3@} Placed in order, arranged, marshalled (as an army); <ls>Bg. 1. 3.</ls> {@--4@} Disarranged, placed out of order. {@--5@} Married. {@--6@} Large, great.
